description: Analyzer for BR-12 REACH Compliance Statement

Supplier.description: Company issuing the REACH statement (header/footer or signature block).

MaterialName.description: Material/product name to which the REACH statement applies.

MaterialCode.description: Material identifier/code if printed in the document.

IssueDate.description: Document issue/publication date for the REACH statement.

IsREACHCompliant.description: True if the statement explicitly claims compliance with Regulation (EC) No 1907/2006 (REACH) for intended uses; False if non-compliance or no claim is stated.

SVHCAbove0_1Percent.description: True if the document indicates presence of any SVHC at ≥0.1% w/w; False if it states none at ≥0.1%.

CandidateListDate.description: Date of the ECHA Candidate List update referenced (e.g., 'as of 2025-06-27'). Extract as text to preserve format.

AnnexXVIIRestrictions.description: True if any Annex XVII restricted substances are present above applicable limits; False if explicitly stated none above limits.

SupportingDocsAvailable.description: True if the statement offers supporting documentation upon request; False otherwise.
